mysteryDungeon:ColorlessAgility.NAME: Agility
mysteryDungeon:ColorlessAgility.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurBulletSeed.NAME: Bullet Seed
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurBulletSeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be upgraded multiple times.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurDoubleEdge.NAME: Double Edge
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurDoubleEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal extra damage equal to !M! times your Strength. NL Take damage equal to half your Strength.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurFrenzyPlant.NAME: Frenzy Plant
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurFrenzyPlant.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply 2 Poison !M! times. NL You cannot heal during this turn and the next.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurGigaDrain.NAME: Giga Drain
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurGigaDrain.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurIngrain.NAME: Ingrain
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurIngrain.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 mysterydungeon:Leech_Seed to a random enemy !M! times. NL Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurMegaDrain.NAME: Mega Drain
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurMegaDrain.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP per different Debuff on the enemy.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurParalysisPowder.NAME: Paralysis Powder
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurParalysisPowder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Slow. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPetalDance.NAME: Petal Dance
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPetalDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies at the end of your turn for the next !M! turns. NL (This counts as an Attack and so scales with Strength, etc.)

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonJab.NAME: Poison Jab
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonJab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison 2 times.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonPowder.NAME: Poison Powder
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonPowder.DESCRIPTION: Scatters a toxic powder that may poison the foe. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurProtect.NAME: Protect
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurProtect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You cannot gain block during the next !M! turns.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurRazorLeaf.NAME: Razor Leaf
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurRazorLeaf.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! damage. NL If you have a debuff, Gain [E]

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSeedBomb.NAME: Seed Bomb
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSeedBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSleepPowder.NAME: Sleep Powder
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSleepPowder.DESCRIPTION: Scatters a powder that may cause the foe to sleep. NL Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Asleep. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSolarBeam.NAME: Solar Beam
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSolarBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! less cards during your next turn.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurStrengthSap.NAME: Strength Sap
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurStrengthSap.DESCRIPTION: Target loses !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Strength if target lost Strength that way. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSunnyDay.NAME: Sunny Day
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSunnyDay.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, NL Draw one more card and Reduce by 1 the cost of the card with the highest cost in your hand.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSunnyDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, NL Draw one more card and Reduce by 1 the cost of the card with the highest cost in your hand.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSynthesis.NAME: Synthesis
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL At the start of your next turn, NL Draw 2 more cards and gain 2 [E]. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurToxic.NAME: Toxic
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurToxic.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Toxic to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurToxic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Toxic to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurVenoshock.NAME: Venoshock
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurVenoshock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each stack of Poison of the target.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurVineWhip.NAME: Vine Whip
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurVineWhip.DESCRIPTION: Strikes the foe with slender, whiplike vines. NL Deals !D! damage.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurWorrySeed.NAME: Worry Seed
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurWorrySeed.DESCRIPTION: Your card rewards will contain 1 more card choice.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurYawn.NAME: Yawn
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurYawn.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Asleep to ALL enemies right before they act (after Poison, etc.). NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurYawn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Asleep to ALL enemies right before they act (after Poison, etc.). NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBellyDrum.NAME: Belly Drum
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBellyDrum.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn draw !M! more card. NL Also, the first card you play each turn costs 0 and exhausts.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBlastBurn.NAME: Blast Burn
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBlastBurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust your draw pile.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBlaze.NAME: Blaze
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBlaze.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL The first time you spend all energy each turn, gain [E].
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBlaze.UPGRADE_DESRIPTION: Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL The first 2 times you spend all energy each turn, gain [E].

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderCounter.NAME: Counter
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderCounter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you lose all Block and take damage from an attack, deal !M! damage to the attacker.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderCrunch.NAME: Crunch
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderCrunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonBreath.NAME: Dragon Breath
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonBreath.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of exhausted cards this combat.
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonBreath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to 5 + the number of exhausted cards this combat.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonRage.NAME: Dragon Rage
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonRage.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Enemy loses !D! HP. Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDrought.NAME: Drought
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDrought.DESCRIPTION: When you apply mysterydungeon:Burn, apply !M! more.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFacade.NAME: Facade
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFacade.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity for each !M! different debuffs on the enemy. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFireBlast.NAME: Fire Blast
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFireBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Burn. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFireFang.NAME: Fire Fang
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFireFang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply mysterydungeon:Burn equal to the unblocked damage.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFireSpin.NAME: Fire Spin
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFireSpin.DESCRIPTION: Apply as much Poison as the enemy has mysterydungeon:Burn NL Remove all mysterydungeon:Burn.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFlamethrower.NAME: Flamethrower
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFlamethrower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Burn to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFlareBlitz.NAME: Flare Blitz
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFlareBlitz.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of exhausted cards this combat.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderHeatWave.NAME: Heat Wave
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderHeatWave.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Burn. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderInferno.NAME: Inferno
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderInferno.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Burn to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderMetalClaw.NAME: Metal Claw
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderMetalClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL All your mysterydungeon:Claws deal !M! more damage this combat.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderOverheat.NAME: Overheat
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderOverheat.DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 damage. NL Deal additional damage equal to the number of mysterydungeon:Burn stacks on the enemy. NL Remove half the enemies' mysterydungeon:Burn stacks.
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderOverheat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 damage. NL Deal additional damage equal to the number of mysterydungeon:Burn stacks on the enemy.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderShadowClaw.NAME: Shadow Claw
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderShadowClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL This cards Block gets more Block instead of damage.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderSolarPower.NAME: Solar Power
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderSolarPower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain 1 Strength if an enemy is affected by mysterydungeon:Burn.
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderSolarPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL At the start of each turn, gain 1 Strength if an enemy is affected by mysterydungeon:Burn.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderSunnyDay.NAME: Sunny Day
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderSunnyDay.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, NL Draw one more card and Reduce by 1 the cost of the card with the highest cost in your hand.
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderSunnyDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, NL Draw one more card and Reduce by 1 the cost of the card with the highest cost in your hand.
